meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affected with empyema.
meanings.sent1: The empyemic fluid was drained from the patient's lung.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the empyemic infection.
meanings.sent3: The empyemic odor in the room made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The empyemic clouds in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The empyemic wound needed immediate attention to prevent further complications.

meanings.sent1: The empyemic abscess was carefully drained by the surgeon.
meanings.sent2: The empyemic discharge from the wound was concerning.
meanings.sent3: The empyemic appearance of the spoiled milk made me gag.
meanings.sent4: The empyemic texture of the mud reminded me of a festering wound.
meanings.sent5: The empyemic sore on his arm needed to be cleaned and bandaged.
